duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement, maintain, and administer network security tools for preventing, detecting, and responding to security events.
Collaborate with Information Technology teams to configure data flows and integration with various systems.
Assess and assist in the development of network security requirements, and evaluate security services and technologies.
Identify systems misconfigurations and serve as a resource to correct and analyze the configurations.
Maintain availability of security technologies, including IPS, WAF, EDR, NDR, and MFA.
Manage and provide engineering support to EDR and NDR solutions, including client and system health, upgrades, protection policies, and logs.
Review firewall security policies and profiles and make recommendations to the Network infrastructure team based on security best practices.
Maintain Secure Web Gateway, including traffic steering configuration, client health, and client configuration.
Proactively identify and determine priority for any network security gaps and bridge the gap between security and network engineering teams.
Partner with project teams to ensure control techniques are incorporated into the overall security model regarding operating systems, applications, database management, and network management.
Provide clear and concise documentation of technical solutions and communicate plans to management and customers.
Assess new and changing security needs and select the right tools for those needs.
Build scripts and techniques to automate and speed up tasks.
Research, evaluate, and recommend new or improved information security software and tools.

education_certification.credential: Four-Year undergraduate degree in a technical field or equivalent experience.
